channel.title: Moved the HD to new hardware, VM's won't start
channel.description: I get an error "Node device not found", should I have created a backup and restored it instead of using the same HD ? Will it be possible to make the VM's usable without returning the HD to the old hardware?

item.title: Moved the HD to new hardware, VM's won't start
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This should be redirected to Qubes, not Whonix support, please see:
https://forums.whonix.org/t/what-to-post-in-this-qubes-whonix-forum-and-what-not

Read full topic
item.source: Moved the HD to new hardware, VM's won't start

item.title: Moved the HD to new hardware, VM's won't start
item.dc:creator: claudi8b6
item.description:
I get an error “Node device not found”, should I have created a backup and restored it instead of using the same HD ? Will it be possible to make the VM’s usable without returning the HD to the old hardware?
